<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension"></a>

# MultiplayerPeerExtension

**Inherits:** [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) **\<** [PacketPeer](PacketPeer.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Class that can be inherited to implement custom multiplayer API networking layers via GDExtension.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class is designed to be inherited from a GDExtension plugin to implement custom networking layers for the multiplayer API (such as WebRTC). All the methods below **must** be implemented to have a working custom multiplayer implementation. See also [MultiplayerAPI](MultiplayerAPI.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__close"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_close**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__close)

Called when the multiplayer peer should be immediately closed (see [MultiplayerPeer.close()](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_method_close)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__disconnect_peer"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_disconnect_peer**\ (\ p_peer\: [int](int.md), p_force\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__disconnect_peer)

Called when the connected `p_peer` should be forcibly disconnected (see [MultiplayerPeer.disconnect_peer()](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_method_disconnect_peer)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_available_packet_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **_get_available_packet_count**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_available_packet_count)

Called when the available packet count is internally requested by the [MultiplayerAPI](MultiplayerAPI.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_connection_status"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[ConnectionStatus](MultiplayerPeer.md#enum_MultiplayerPeer_ConnectionStatus) **_get_connection_status**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_connection_status)

Called when the connection status is requested on the [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) (see [MultiplayerPeer.get_connection_status()](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_method_get_connection_status)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_max_packet_size"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **_get_max_packet_size**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_max_packet_size)

Called when the maximum allowed packet size (in bytes) is requested by the [MultiplayerAPI](MultiplayerAPI.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **_get_packet**\ (\ r_buffer\: `const uint8_t **`, r_buffer_size\: `int32_t*`\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet)

Called when a packet needs to be received by the [MultiplayerAPI](MultiplayerAPI.md), with `r_buffer_size` being the size of the binary `r_buffer` in bytes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet_channel"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **_get_packet_channel**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet_channel)

Called to get the channel over which the next available packet was received. See [MultiplayerPeer.get_packet_channel()](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_method_get_packet_channel).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[TransferMode](MultiplayerPeer.md#enum_MultiplayerPeer_TransferMode) **_get_packet_mode**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet_mode)

Called to get the transfer mode the remote peer used to send the next available packet. See [MultiplayerPeer.get_packet_mode()](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_method_get_packet_mode).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet_peer"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **_get_packet_peer**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet_peer)

Called when the ID of the [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) who sent the most recent packet is requested (see [MultiplayerPeer.get_packet_peer()](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_method_get_packet_peer)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet_script"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedByteArray](PackedByteArray.md) **_get_packet_script**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet_script)

Called when a packet needs to be received by the [MultiplayerAPI](MultiplayerAPI.md), if [_get_packet()](MultiplayerPeerExtension.md#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_packet) isn't implemented. Use this when extending this class via GDScript.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_transfer_channel"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **_get_transfer_channel**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_transfer_channel)

Called when the transfer channel to use is read on this [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) (see [MultiplayerPeer.transfer_channel](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_property_transfer_channel)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_transfer_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[TransferMode](MultiplayerPeer.md#enum_MultiplayerPeer_TransferMode) **_get_transfer_mode**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_transfer_mode)

Called when the transfer mode to use is read on this [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) (see [MultiplayerPeer.transfer_mode](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_property_transfer_mode)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_unique_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **_get_unique_id**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__get_unique_id)

Called when the unique ID of this [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) is requested (see [MultiplayerPeer.get_unique_id()](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_method_get_unique_id)). The value must be between ``1`` and ``2147483647``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__is_refusing_new_connections"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_is_refusing_new_connections**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__is_refusing_new_connections)

Called when the "refuse new connections" status is requested on this [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) (see [MultiplayerPeer.refuse_new_connections](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_property_refuse_new_connections)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__is_server"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_is_server**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__is_server)

Called when the "is server" status is requested on the [MultiplayerAPI](MultiplayerAPI.md). See [MultiplayerAPI.is_server()](MultiplayerAPI.md#MultiplayerAPI_method_is_server).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__is_server_relay_supported"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_is_server_relay_supported**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__is_server_relay_supported)

Called to check if the server can act as a relay in the current configuration. See [MultiplayerPeer.is_server_relay_supported()](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_method_is_server_relay_supported).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__poll"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_poll**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__poll)

Called when the [MultiplayerAPI](MultiplayerAPI.md) is polled. See [MultiplayerAPI.poll()](MultiplayerAPI.md#MultiplayerAPI_method_poll).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__put_packet"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **_put_packet**\ (\ p_buffer\: `const uint8_t*`, p_buffer_size\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__put_packet)

Called when a packet needs to be sent by the [MultiplayerAPI](MultiplayerAPI.md), with `p_buffer_size` being the size of the binary `p_buffer` in bytes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__put_packet_script"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **_put_packet_script**\ (\ p_buffer\: [PackedByteArray](PackedByteArray.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__put_packet_script)

Called when a packet needs to be sent by the [MultiplayerAPI](MultiplayerAPI.md), if [_put_packet()](MultiplayerPeerExtension.md#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__put_packet) isn't implemented. Use this when extending this class via GDScript.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__set_refuse_new_connections"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_refuse_new_connections**\ (\ p_enable\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__set_refuse_new_connections)

Called when the "refuse new connections" status is set on this [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) (see [MultiplayerPeer.refuse_new_connections](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_property_refuse_new_connections)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__set_target_peer"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_target_peer**\ (\ p_peer\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__set_target_peer)

Called when the target peer to use is set for this [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) (see [MultiplayerPeer.set_target_peer()](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_method_set_target_peer)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__set_transfer_channel"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_transfer_channel**\ (\ p_channel\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__set_transfer_channel)

Called when the channel to use is set for this [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) (see [MultiplayerPeer.transfer_channel](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_property_transfer_channel)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__set_transfer_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_transfer_mode**\ (\ p_mode\: [TransferMode](MultiplayerPeer.md#enum_MultiplayerPeer_TransferMode)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#MultiplayerPeerExtension_private_method__set_transfer_mode)

Called when the transfer mode is set on this [MultiplayerPeer](MultiplayerPeer.md) (see [MultiplayerPeer.transfer_mode](MultiplayerPeer.md#MultiplayerPeer_property_transfer_mode)).
